structure.unit: Labels, Trade Marks, Names And Registration Thereof

law.catch_line: Destruction Or Mutilation Of Registered Cans
law.text: No person shall without the consent of an owner wilfully destroy, mutilate or deface any registered can, tub or cabinet bearing such ownerâ€™s name, or wilfully erase, mar, cover or change any word or name branded, engraved, blown or otherwise produced in a permanent manner in or upon such can, tub or cabinet.
